description: This Dart file defines an application theme class for a Flutter project, encapsulating color palette, theme data, and styling configurations for UI components.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class providing static methods and color constants to generate consistent app themes across the Flutter application.

methods.name: light
methods.description: A static method returning a ThemeData object configured for the light theme, incorporating color schemes, text themes, and component styles.
